pages.text:
BALL & CHAIN
LITTLE HAVANA, FLORIDA
CONTACT BALL & CHAIN
/*
*/
function awbMapInit() {}
/*
*/
CONTACT BALL & CHAIN
For table reservations, please use the form on the
Table Reservation page
Ball & Chain
1513 S.W. 8th Street
Little Havana, FL 33135
General Inquiries:
info@ballandchainmiami.com
Or use the form below.
We have already received your request, and will be in touch shortly.
HOURS
Monday – Tuesday:
11:00am – 12:00am
Wednesday:
11:00am – 1:00am
Thursday:
11:00am – 2:00am
Friday & Saturday:
11:00am – 3:00am
Sunday:
11:00am – 1:00am
21+ with Photo ID after 8:00pm – US State issued driver’s license or ID, US passport, or US Military ID. A Passport is only form of foreign ID accepted.
Enjoy live music, dancing, and delicious food all day long from 12:00pm – 8:00pm for all ages!
JOIN THE TEAM
We’re always looking for bright, energetic people to join our team. If you’re interested in working at Ball & Chain, please fill out our online job application and we will be in touch with you!
JOBS & EMPLOYMENT
For privacy reasons Google Maps needs your permission to be loaded. For more details, please see our
Privacy Policy
.

ADMISSIONS & ID
Enjoy delicious Cuban food all day from 11am – midnight, no ID required! 21+ with proper state or federal ID required after 8pm.

Next
Miami Nightlife! Live Performances, DJ’s, Salsa Dancing, & More!
LOCAL HANGOUT, MIAMI NIGHTLIFE DESTINATION
The World-Famous Ball & Chain features some of the best live music Miami has to offer, as well as DJ’s, Jazz Performances, Salsa Classes, Musical Productions, Themed Events, Music Festivals, and more. It is truly a must-visit destination for Miami Nightlife! Stop by and experience the excitement. We recommend
reservations for large groups
, and can
host your private event as well
. We look forward to seeing you!

ADMISSIONS & ID
Enjoy delicious Cuban food all day from 11am – midnight, no ID required! 21+ with proper state or federal ID required after 8pm.

PRIVATE EVENTS
BALL & CHAIN IS THE PERFECT VENUE FOR YOUR...
Private Events
PRIVATE EVENTS AT BALL & CHAIN
Ball & Chain is the perfect
event venue
for private events for guests wanting an authentic Little Havana experience. The moment you walk through our doors, you can feel the 80 years of our history emanating from our walls. From the wood beamed ceilings, to the hand-painted Cuban tile floors, you are transported to a time period when men donned their best hats and women dressed to the nines to sip mojitos and listen to the worlds best music. Our catering menus include delicious paellas, cooked on site, and authentic Latin stations. We also allow outside catering for those with dietary restrictions. Our
bar menus
have been designed by Miami’s best mixologists, and truly highlight local ingredients. In house, we offer many additional elements that can enhance your event. From live cigar rollers, to salsa dancers, to custom made domino tables, our team can help you put together a spectacular experience for your group.
If you are planning a small birthday or get together where a private space is not required, please
Book a Table here.
For networking and corporate events, large birthday parties, bachelorette parties, holiday parties, weddings and related events, or anything you need a unique private
event venue in Miami
for please email us at
events@ballandchainmiami.com
or
fill out the form below.
21+ with Photo ID – US State issued driver’s license or ID, US passport, or US Military ID. A Passport is only form of foreign ID accepted.
PINEAPPLE STAGE
®
at Ball & Chain
